properties.name: Zhujiajiao
properties.desc: Super pretty water town with lots of historic architecture and yummy food.

properties.name: Leifeng Pagoda
properties.desc: Originally a Buddhist tower that has been rebuilt over the years. I sadly didn't have time to go see the view from the topmost level.

properties.name: Humble Administrator's Garden
properties.desc: A part of the Classical Gardens of Suzhou. The lotus ponds were really pretty!

properties.name: Nanjing Fuzimiao
properties.desc: A Confucius Temple where the imperial exam was held. There's a museum on the same street with a cheatsheet from the Qing Dynasty on display. As expected, the handwriting is tiny, haha.
